Blog.post: We Won Inter-class debate!!!!!!! Boy, everyone is soooo happy. Three cheers for debate team!!!!*claps* Tennis is a BORE. The kids there are so damn good!!!! Makes me look like an amatuer*shamefaced* Ok, gotta go for other things. dark-wind out.

Well, that's that. And blast chinese,the worst subject in the world!!!!!! :P

Ok, is this all I have to say? Dark-wind out.
